name: iShares ESG Aware MSCI USA ETF
description: The iShares ESG Aware MSCI USA ETF (ticker: IGEB) is an exchange-traded fund designed to track the performance of the MSCI USA Extended ESG Focus Index. This ETF aims to provide exposure to U.S. companies with high environmental, social, and governance (ESG) performance relative to their sector peers, while also considering traditional financial metrics. The fund is managed by BlackRock, one of the largest asset management firms in the world, and reflects a growing trend among investors seeking to align their portfolios with sustainable and responsible investment principles. IGEB includes a diversified range of large- to mid-cap U.S. stocks, providing investors with a balanced approach to equity exposure that incorporates ESG criteria. The ETF is suitable for investors looking to integrate ESG factors into their investment strategies while maintaining a focus on capital appreciation. With a commitment to transparency and low costs, IGEB offers a competitive expense ratio, making it accessible for both retail and institutional investors who prioritize sustainable investing. As the demand for responsible investing continues to rise, IGEB stands out as a viable option for those looking to invest in a manner that reflects their values while still aiming for solid financial returns.

products: iShares ESG Aware MSCI USA ETF

faq.answer: IGEB seeks to track the performance of the MSCI USA Extended ESG Focus Index, emphasizing companies with strong ESG criteria.
